sentences.sContent: They can be applied in any context, as long as you understand how to apply them, of course.
sentences.sCn: 他们可以在任何一种背景下应用，当然，只要你懂得如何去应用他们。

sentences.sContent: Why, in its presence, should I deny the joy of living, as long as I know everything is not included in this joy?
sentences.sCn: 为什么在生活的快乐明明存在时，只要我知道一切都不存在于这种快乐中，我就会否认这种快乐？

sentences.sContent: But he said as long as we remained the only intelligent life in our galaxy and avoided destroying ourselves we should be safe.
sentences.sCn: 但是他说只要我们保持在我们的星系中是唯一有智力的生命并且避免破坏我们自己，我们就会安全。
